post:
To celebrate the end of February we're including a 10% discount on our openVZ vps plans. Plans start at $5 plus the discount get it at $4.95/month and save more by paying for longer.

Basic VPS includes:
>2 cpu cores

>30GB HDD

>768 MB RAM

>1000 GB Bandwidth

>100 Mbit port

>1 dedicated ip

Choose your preferred location between our New Jersey and Honduras DC in the vps order notes. Control panels available at an additional cost, both Cpanel and Plesk. Plans are scalable to fit your needs. Visit our website for more information http://laceibanetsociety.com/en/vps-services/openvz-vps/
